function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement additional measures to verify participant attention and engagement.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strong data security measures and obtain informed consent for data collection.","category":"Clear communication, enforcement of sanctions, reminders, and moral appeals","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promote diverse sources of information, fact-checking, and critical thinking skills, encourage exposure to different viewpoints","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote trust in authorities through transparency, accountability, and clear communication","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement proactive measures to reduce practical opportunities for rule breaking, and reinforce the importance of compliance","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promote positive social norms through public awareness campaigns and community engagement","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provision of mental health support, stress reduction techniques, and positive coping strategies","category":"Provision of mental health support, stress reduction techniques, and positive coping strategies","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provision of resources for practical support, education on quarantine guidelines, and accessibility accommodations","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Validate self-report measures with objective methods to ensure accuracy of compliance assessment","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Develop targeted interventions to address moral support, reduce perceived costs, and alleviate strain","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Clear communication, enforcement of sanctions, reminders, and moral appeals","category":"Clear communication, enforcement of sanctions, reminders, and moral appeals","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clear communication, consistent messaging, and targeted appeals to different demographic groups","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transparent guidelines, fair application of sanctions, and clear communication of consequences","category":"Clear communication, enforcement of sanctions, reminders, and moral appeals","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting comprehensive studies that capture a wide range of factors influencing compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing strict privacy regulations, anonymizing data, and obtaining informed consent for data collection","category":"Clear communication, enforcement of sanctions, reminders, and moral appeals","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting comprehensive studies that consider a wide range of factors influencing compliance with covid-19 mitigation measures","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Public education and enforcement of social distancing guidelines","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clear communication of essential activities, financial support for those unable to stay at home","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Public awareness campaigns, education on the importance of compliance, and enforcement of regulations","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Support systems for mental health, community engagement, and economic assistance for affected individuals","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collection and analysis, behavioral research, and interdisciplinary collaboration","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Frequent cleaning and disinfection of high-touch surfaces, ventilation of indoor spaces","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further research and analysis to verify the accuracy of the findings","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Implement strict cleaning and disinfection protocols for all surfaces","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct additional experiments to confirm the consistency of results on cardboard surfaces","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Enhanced ventilation systems, air purification, and use of personal protective equipment","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent disinfection, use of antimicrobial surfaces, and hand hygiene","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research on implications for public health, vaccine development, and infection control strategies","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure the implementation of recommendations from global conferences through international cooperation and monitoring mechanisms","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement programs and policies focused on environmental sustainability, equity, and humanitarian solidarity","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Convene a global deliberative forum, establish coordinated response strategies","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement effective regulations, enhance monitoring of supply chains","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invest in infrastructure, improve healthcare facilities and resources","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Appointing effective global leaders and strengthening containment with civil liberties and public engagement","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ensuring temporary measures and safeguarding democratic processes","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exploring alternative economic and social policy approaches","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide financial support for gig workers to enable them to take time off when experiencing covid-19 symptoms","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement minimum employment standards for gig workers, regardless of their classification as independent contractors","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Government-led overhaul of employment services and vocational training policies to improve coordination and quality of training","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Policies to address the social and economic disparities sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement measures to enforce social distancing and reduce crowd size","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement support programs, financial aid, and job creation initiatives to address unemployment","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"}]}
